#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
 
using namespace std;
 
typedef long long ll;
int a[100001],b[100001],c[100001];
ll b_search1(int x,int en,int n)
{
    en=min(en,n-1);
    int st=0,mid;
    while(st<=en)
    {
        mid=(st+en)>>1;
        if(x<a[mid])
            en=mid-1;
        else
            st=mid+1;
    }
    return st;
}
ll b_search3(int x,int st,int n)
{
    if(st>=n)
        return 0;
    int en=n-1,mid;
    while(st<=en)
    {
        mid=(st+en)>>1;
        if(x>c[mid])
            st=mid+1;
        else
            en=mid-1;
    }
    return n-st;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int p,q,r,i;
        ll ans=0;
        cin>>p;
        for(i=0;i<p;i++)
            cin>>a[i];
        cin>>q;
        for(i=0;i<q;i++)
            cin>>b[i];
        cin>>r;
        for(i=0;i<r;i++)
            cin>>c[i];
        for(i=0;i<q;i++)
        {
            ll left=b_search1(b[i],i,p);
            ll right=b_search3(b[i],i,r);
            ans+=left*right;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
 
    return 0;
}
